overview: Ryan Power is back and he means business.  This second trip to Fiesta Texas is done ride-by-ride “just like last time.”  Thrill to the psychedelic sights and sounds of a Texas theme park as you are slowly worn down by the implacable will of this young man.  Ryan previously appeared in our short Snack and Drink and the ‘unreleased’ Ryan’s Capitol Tour.  He also shows up briefly in Waking Life (as an alien leaving Earth).
title: The Even More Fun Trip
